to/TO shut./RP In/IN consequence/NN of/IN this/DT difficulty,/JJ foot/NN passengers/NNS had/VBD made/VBN themselves/PRP a/DT way/NN upon/IN each/DT side/NN of/IN it,/DT through/IN which/WDT they/PRP
